name: Pilot Attack
description:
Horizontally scrolling shooter for Sinclair ZX Spectrum 48k home computer

Programming : Mika "Misfit" Keränen

Testing : Stefan Vogt http://8-bit.info/

buy a physical cassette release: The Future Was 8Bit

Tip (version 1.0):

If you have a real Spectrum+2 or 3, SD-card reader and have problems to load the game. 
push extend mode, write "out 32765,48" and load.
